	id = 40002

	id = 40005
	picture = "supportwar"

# Avari Admirals
country_event = {
	id = 40009
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Admirals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Admirals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_admirals
		add_country_modifier = { name = recruited_admirals duration = 730 }
		random_list = {
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Dakambaerth the Faithful" background = nobleman_bad personality = defiant } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Eldimoth Lord of the Rivers" background = nobleman personality = deliberate } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Caenn the Commander" background = officer personality = reserved } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Saéswana Lord of the Rivers" background = no_background personality = inspiring } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Aywipen of the Forest" background = nobleman personality = bigoted } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Onaeithor the Old One" background = nobleman_good personality = brash } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Pleedro the Dissident" background = no_background personality = cautious } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Thannor the Commander" background = nobleman_bad personality = aggressive } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Qilikanthae the Elder" background = no_background personality = brash } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Flaeynnhv the Faithful" background = nobleman_good personality = persistent } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Araathoridan the Wise" background = officer personality = deliberate } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Dakambaerth Lord of the Mountain" background = no_background personality = tactical } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Araathoridan the Commander" background = nobleman personality = ballsy } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Alleyn the Faithful" background = no_background personality = stalwart } }

# Khandish Generals
country_event = {
	id = 40014
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Generals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Generals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_generals
		add_country_modifier = { name = recruited_generals duration = 730 }
		random_list = {
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Jagadai of Sturlurza" background = nobleman personality = persistent } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Ugablai of the East" background = nobleman_good personality = defiant } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Zuhr of Ammú" background = nobleman_good personality = heroic } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Rhukar of the Gap" background = no_background personality = aggressive } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Keemac of Sturlurza" background = nobleman personality = inspiring } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Temublai of Chelkar" background = nobleman_bad personality = deliberate } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Mongke of the Gap" background = officer personality = ungallant } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Cagri of the East" background = nobleman_bad personality = heroic } }

	id = 40019
	picture = "supportwar"

# Anduinrim Admirals
country_event = {
	id = 40023
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Admirals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Admirals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_admirals
		add_country_modifier = { name = recruited_admirals duration = 730 }

			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Cuoern Wizard-friend" background = no_background personality = reserved } }

# Druedain Generals

	id = 40026
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Generals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Generals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_generals

# Rohirrim Admirals
country_event = {
	id = 40031
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Admirals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Admirals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_admirals
		add_country_modifier = { name = recruited_admirals duration = 730 }
		random_list = {
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Horn the Young" background = no_background personality = cautious } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Thengel Arngriming" background = no_background personality = stout } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Wulf Éomunding" background = nobleman personality = resolute } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Oswed of the Isen" background = officer personality = harsh } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Wídfara Swithelming" background = no_background personality = mediocre } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Folcred of Harrowdale" background = no_background personality = tactical } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Oswed Arngriming" background = nobleman_good personality = tactical } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Dernhelm Godwarding" background = no_background personality = mediocre } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Déor Godwarding" background = officer personality = tactical } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Elfhelm Helmingas" background = nobleman_bad personality = heroic } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Freca of Everholt" background = officer personality = deliberate } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Harding Steelsheen" background = nobleman_bad personality = stout } }
			1 = { define_admiral = { name = "Unferth of Dunharrow" background = nobleman_bad personality = inspiring } }

# Angmarrim Generals
country_event = {
	id = 40034
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Generals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Generals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_generals
		add_country_modifier = { name = recruited_generals duration = 730 }
		random_list = {
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Athalward of the North" background = nobleman_bad personality = tactical } }
			1 = { define_general = { name = "Surnir of the Mountains" background = nobleman_bad personality = deliberate } }

# Hobbit Generals
country_event = {
	id = 40040
	picture = "supportwar"
	title = "Recruit Generals"
	desc = "EVTDESC40000"

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "Standard Generals"
		remove_country_modifier = recruited_generals
